name: Mocha
description: Fresh espresso with steamed milk and rich chocolate.
ingredients: Mocha Sauce [Water, Sugar, Cocoa Processed With Alkali, Natural Flavor]
Whipped Cream [Cream (Cream, Mono And Diglycerides, Carageenan), Vanilla Syrup (Sugar, Water, Natural Flavors, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid)]
